'''''Chilly-Churl''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Challenger: Series III]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat a [[Frostarm Lawachurl]] before its Infused Form can expire.

==Trivia==
* The Chinese name of this achievement is a reference to the movie ''{{w|Léon: The Professional|Léon}}'', known as {{zh|这个杀手不太冷|Zhège Shāshǒu Bù Tài Lěng|This Killer Isn't Too Cold}} in China.
